Open Source Ruby on Rails Course

lessons mini-lessons prework projects resources skills style terminology

Lessons

These are the major lessons to be covered in the Open Source Ruby on Rails Developer course. They are here organized by the day on which they are intended to be taught, but that may change depending on the progress of the students. Regardless of the speed with which the material is covered, they should be completed in this order - they are intended to be cumulative.

==============================

  • 03 Mar 2014 » Week 1 : Lesson 1 : Ice Breakers
  • 03 Mar 2014 » Week 1 : Lesson 2 : The Terminal
